results.title: Simvastatin Alleviates Intestinal Ischemia/Reperfusion Injury by Modulating Omi/HtrA2 Signaling Pathways.
results.text_hl: PURPOSE: The objective of this research was to survey the therapeutic action of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@) on @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@intestinal ischemia/reperfusion injury@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Oculocutaneous_albinism_type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537730 @@@II@@@/RI) by modulating Omi/@GENE_HTRA2 @GENE_297376 @@@HtrA2@@@ signaling pathways.
